response.overview: It is a transit between metaphorical territories intertwining the micro and the macro, the egg and Venus, where the erotic and love become a cosmic and sentimental journey. The axis is the female body, as a source of pleasure and life, the ungovernable universe, where the complementary male element surrounds it in an echo, which drifts into the void.  To make it, we used interpolated film with super 8 of Swedish erotica, videos and images from NASA of Venus and its transit over the sun, recorded in 2012 and illustrative videos of fertilization, ovulation and nesting
response.title: A Love Song
